225.movie_plot: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.

37.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)

20.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
